alert.note: Alert for Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Rosebud; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 7:29PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Musselshell, northeastern Yellowstone, northern Rosebud and northwestern Treasure Counties through 830 PM MDT... At 727 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles southeast of Roundup to 17 miles north of Custer. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Melstone and Musselshell. This advisory does not include the city of Billings. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for southeastern Montana.

area.areaDesc: Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Rosebud; Treasure
